item.title: Responding To Ransomware: The Importance Of Not Paying The Ransom
item.description: Ultimately, refusing to pay the ransom will help regain a more secure digital future.

item.title: The Human Element Of Risk Management
item.description: Data breach prevention is only as strong as the weakest link, and, in most cases, that link is human.

item.title: How Behavior-Driven Development Aligns Product Development
item.description: The method forces you to dig deeper into the product you are building than simply using user stories to define a product.
